de.mcp.cutcad.application

Class Tool

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mcp.cutcad.application.Tool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable2D
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangeSTLTool, ConnectTool, CopyTool, CutoutTool, DeleteTool, ImportSTLTool, ImportSVGTool, LoadTool, NewProjectTool, PolygonTool, PrintTool, RectangleTool, SaveTool, SelectTool, SymmetricPolygonTool, TrapeziumTool

    public abstract class Tool
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable2D
    Template class for the implementation of a tool. Provides a set of event-based methods that need to be overriden to achieve custom behaviour. Tools can be informed about mouse events (mouseButtonPressed, mouseButtonReleased, mouseMoved) and tool selection events (toolWasSelected, toolWasUnselected). Tools are by now associated with the 2D drawing view of the application. By overriding the draw2D method, it is possible for a tool to draw its own content into the 2D drawing view.
    Author:
    dennis

      • getIconName

        public abstract java.lang.String getIconName()
        Return the name of the SVG for the icon for the tool. This method will be called on initialization to load the icon for later representation.
        Returns:
        The fully qualified name of the SVG of the icon.

      • canStaySelected

        public boolean canStaySelected()
        Return whether this tool can be selected for a longer time (such as the drawing tools or select tool) or whether it is a click-and-forget-tool (such as the save, load or new tool).
        Returns:
        Return whether the tool will stay selected until a new tool is selected.

      • getIcon

        private SVGIcon getIcon()
        Loads the SVGIcon for the tool. Uses getIconName in order to get the icons file name.
        Returns:
        A SVGIcon with the tools icon loaded from the icon SVG file.
